title: More Tabernacle Elements and Inventory
summary: Exodus 38 covers the making of the bronze altar, the bronze basin, and the courtyard. It also includes a detailed record of materials used for the tabernacle, showing integrity in God's work.

faq.question: What was the bronze basin used for?
faq.answer: For the priests to wash before entering the tabernacle or offering sacrifices.

faq.question: Why is the inventory included?
faq.answer: To provide accountability and transparency in how the offerings were used.
